creator: halleux.jf@skynet.be
text:
In the tld file, the value of jsp-version should be checked to be 1.2, 
according to the spec. This is currently not done.

JFH

The spec says jsp-version is mandantory, but not that it has to be 1.2.  A
container may support multiple JPS versions.
creator: kin-man.chung@sun.com
